name: Collapse
text: The Pudding engulfs you and crushes you in a dark abyss.

name: Chittering Snap
text: The Chuul grapples you and voraciously tears away at your flesh with it's pincers.

name: Psychic Intrusion
text: You feel an erie interruption in your mind, right before the immense pain.

name: Double The Fun
text: It wasn't the first club that got you. It was the second one.

name: Dimensional Shriek
text: The Ghost slips from the physical plane with an ear-shattering shriek.

name: Fear Inocculum
text: Before you can mentally understand the creature before you, you feel a blade sink deep into your flesh.

name: Incinerate
text: The Wyrmling rears back and fires a jet of concentrated fire about you.

name: Mesmerize
text: You think it is a good idea to run your blade across your neck...

name: Obliterate
text: You blocked the hammer, but not the boar.

name: Blades and Claws
text: You are attacked in a blinding flash, you block the daggers, but not the teeth... or the claws.
